autoflatten.name: Automatically Flatten NPCs
autoflatten.hint: If enabled, any new NPCs dragged in from the compendiums will automatically be flattened.

halflevel.name: Half Level Proficiency
halflevel.hint: If enabled, all of the flattening functions will use half level, rounded up rather than proficiency without level.

halflevelPC.name: Half Level Proficiency for PCs
halflevelPC.hint: If enabled, all of the flattening functions will work for PCs.
